00023         template<typename T>
00024         inline void write_image(const T& dat, char* &str, size_t& size)
00025         {
00026                 DbObjPtr ptr;
00027                 ptr.reset(new DbObj);
00028                 write_image(dat, ptr);
00029                 str = (char*)ptr->getData();
00030                 size = ptr->getSize();
00031         }
00032 
00033         template<typename T>
00034         inline void read_image(T& dat, const char* str, const size_t& size)
00035         {
00036                 DbObjPtr ptr;
00037                 ptr.reset(new DbObj(str, size));
00038                 read_image(dat, ptr);
00039         }
00040 
00041         template<>
00042         inline void write_image<string>(const string& dat, char* &str, size_t& size)
00043         {
00044                 str = (char*)dat.c_str();
00045                 size = dat.size();
00046         }
00047 
00048         template<>
00049         inline void read_image<string>(string& dat, const char* str, const size_t& size)
00050         {
00051                 dat = str;
00052         }
00053 
00054         template<>
00055         inline void write_image<int>(const int& dat, char* &str, size_t& size)
00056         {
00057                 str = (char*)(&dat);
00058                 size = sizeof(dat);
00059         }
00060 
00061         template<>
00062         inline void read_image<int>(int& dat, const char* str, const size_t& size)
00063         {
00064                 memcpy(&dat, str,sizeof(int));
00065         }
00066 
00067         inline int uint_to_bytes(unsigned int val, char* dest) {
00068                 unsigned int i;
00069                 for(i = 0; i < sizeof(int); i++) {
00070                         dest[i] = (char)((val) & 0xFF);
00071                         val >>= 8;
00072                         if( val == 0)
00073                         break;
00074                 }
00075                 return i;
00076         }
00077 
00078         inline unsigned int bytes_to_uint(int len, char * vals) {
00079                 int dest = 0;
00080                 for(int i = 0; i < len; i++) {
00081                         dest = (dest << 8) | (vals[sizeof(int) - i - 1] & 0xFF);
00082                 }
00083                 return dest;
00084         }

00086         template<typename T>
00087         inline void to_string(const T& dat, string& str) {
00088                 DbObjPtr ptr;
00089                 ptr.reset( new(DbObj) );
00090                 write_image(dat, ptr);
00091                 str = string( (char*) ptr->getData());
00092         }
00093 
00094         template<typename T>
00095         inline void from_string(T& dat, const string& str) {
00096                 DbObjPtr ptr;
00097                 ptr.reset( new DbObj(str.c_str(), str.size()+1 ) );
00098                 read_image(dat, ptr);
00099         }

00120         inline T from_string(const string& str) {
00121                 T dat;

00139         inline void serialize_boost(const T& dat, boost::archive::text_oarchive& ar) {
00140                 ar & dat;
00141 
00142         }

00146                 ar & dat;

00150         inline void serialize_ss(const T& dat, stringstream& ar) {
00151                 ar << dat;
00152 
00153         }

00155         template<typename T>
00156         inline void deserialize_ss(T& dat, const stringstream& ar) {
00157                 ar >> dat;
